name: Levelup RPG 2D
description:
==========================
Game Introduction
==========================
Hunt monsters all over the island!
Monsters spawn endlessly, so you can level up endlessly!

Kill monsters and get materials!
Use the materials to get powerful weapons!

==========================
How to play
==========================
Defeat monsters incessantly!
Collect materials to increase the area you can move to!

You can also use the materials to create weapons.
Collect as many as you can!

==========================
End Content
==========================
Defeat the demon king that lies on the island

==========================
Operation
==========================
Move...
Scroll the screen

Battle...
　Approach Enemies

Recover...
　Press the [Recover] button to recover 20% of your HP.

Skill...
Press the [Skill] button. Gives a powerful blow.

==========================
Additional Content
==========================
Ranking...
　There is no upper limit to leveling up!　
　Level up among all users.　

Island development...
　This is the first time I've seen this game.
　Use materials to complete the island!

Skills...
　Each sword has its own powerful skill technique.
　Find the most powerful skills!
